full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender: Temporary Help Services Against Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

## Tender Announcement Details

* **Solicitation Number**: S5030698
* **Date of Publication**: June 27, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 8, 2024 at 13:00:00
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

## Background

The Department of National Defense (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to qualified suppliers under the Supply Arrangement for Temporary Help Services (EN578-172870), Stream 5 - Computer Services, Category 5.1 Computer Application Support. This RFP seeks to engage a supplier to provide Temporary Help Services for a specified period.

## Requirement Description

The successful bidder will provide Temporary Help Services to support the Department of National Defense (DND). The scope of work includes:

* Providing temporary staff with computer application support skills
* Meeting the needs of DND for temporary help services in the National Capital Region (NCR)

## Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible to bid on this RFP, suppliers must:

* Be a qualified supplier under the Supply Arrangement for Temporary Help Services (EN578-172870)
* Meet the requirements of Stream 5 - Computer Services, Category 5.1 Computer Application Support
* Meet the eligibility criteria specified in the RFP document

## Invited Suppliers

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal in response to this RFP:

* AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Dublin Bay Ltd.
* Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
* I4C INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CONSULTING INC
* iFathom Corporation
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Pennant Canada Limited
* Prologic Systems Ltd.
* ROCK Networks Inc. 
* Solutions LDC Inc.
* TechWind Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Tundra Technical Solutions Inc
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.

## Contact Information

For further information on this RFP, please contact the contracting officer at:

* CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

Please note that all communications related to this RFP must be made in writing and must be received by the contracting officer by the tender closing date and
